definition.name: Translate Readme
definition.description: Automate translation of your README.md files via Crowdin
definition.author: Andrii Bodnar

inputs.name: branch
inputs.description: Specify branch name to create in Crowdin

inputs.name: destination
inputs.description: A directory where the localized readmes will be placed

inputs.name: languages
inputs.description: A list of languages to translate the Readme

inputs.name: language_switcher
inputs.description: Defines whether to add a language switcher to the Readme

inputs.name: upload_sources
inputs.description: Defines whether to upload the source file to Crowdin

inputs.name: download_translations
inputs.description: Defines whether to download translations from Crowdin
